Package project.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Algorythm
    This is class container of the information about the assigning algorithm type.
    ComputerSystem
    This class describes the computer system.
    ComputerSystem.SortByPriority
    Class comparator for sorting system nodes by priority property.
    DataTransmission
    This class contains information about data transmission between two computer system nodes.
    GLink
    This class describes task graph transition link.
    GNode
    Contains information about task graph node and additional methods to interact with it.
    Graph
    This class describes acyclic directed graph, which represents the task to solve on the computer system.
    Graph.SortByCriticalTime
    This class comparator sorts list of graph nodes by critical path time.
    Graph.SortByOutgoingGLinks
    This class comparator sorts list of graph nodes by the number of outgoing transitions.
    GraphGenerator
    This class is created to generate random task graphs to load them to the computer systems with different topologies.
    ProcessorLink
    This class describes physical link of the computer system node.
    SystemLink
    This class describes logical connection between two system nodes.
    SystemNode
    This class holds the information and methods about computer system node.
    Tact
    Class Tact contains information about single tact in system node.
    Test
